title: Body type face for business
content:
Hello,

I just created a new logo and letterhead design for our company. I am having a very difficult time finding a font to use in the body of our communications. I have attached a PDF of the logo and an example of the letterhead. Any help would be great. Also, if anyone has any suggesions for the logo type and/or changes that would tie it in better with a body font please let me know.

Thanks in adavance.

Jesse

author: jslost

comments.content: I would look at a serif typeface to contrast with the sans serif type of your CI. Times could even work. Depending on the size of your company you might want to use a universally accessible typeface anyone can use.
Thanks for the feedback. I agree that it may be a good idea to contrast the CI with a serif typeface. Does anyone else have any font recommendations, serif or not, for the body?
